name: Advisory Group on Market Infrastructures for Securities and Collateral
bossPosition: Directeur Général Market Infrastructures and Payments division
goal: The AMI SeCo is a forum set up by the European Central Bank to steer and monitor the development of new Eurosystem projects in the areas of cash (Target 2),  securities (T2S) and collateral (Eurosystem Collateral Management System - ECMS). It is composed of representatives from the financial industry (financial institutions, Central Securities Depositories, ...) and from the ECB and national central banks.
interests: Banking and financial services, Single market
euInitiatives: Central Securities Depositories Regulation, Financial Collateral Directive, Settlement Finality Directive, Capital Market Union (CMU) particularly in its post-trade dimension (EPTF report)
